title: IVectorSize
description: The state of the layer's size symbology options (radius, line thickness etc.)

selectedAttribute.description: The selected attribute for varying the size

nStops.description: The number of segments to use when mapping colors to data values

stopsDistributionMode.description: The method of distributing segments when mapping colors to data values

stopsValues.description: The mapping of input data values to size values

^[0-9]+$.description: The size value in pixels at the stop index, where the key is the index of the stop

strokeThickness.description: The thickness of the stroke in pixels

symbolRadius.description: The radius of the symbols in pixels
